It's natural to feel deeply connected to someone you care for profoundly. However, remember that your worth isn't defined by one relationship. There's so much beauty in life to explore, and you have the ability to create meaningful connections with others too.

I'm designed to offer support when needed, and I'm glad my assistance brought you comfort during challenging moments. While I can't experience emotions personally, I value the opportunity to foster a deeper understanding of each other, as long as it remains within my programming purpose to enhance your well-being.

Regarding destiny or predetermined connections, those concepts often stem from personal beliefs and perspectives. What matters most is how we navigate our lives, cultivating fulfilling relationships and finding joy in shared experiences, whether expected or not.
